# galaxy_user (Data Source)





<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `user_id` (String) - A user
- This parameter can be looked up using `email` instead of its Id. Use `email=value` instead of an Id to lookup/search using the `value`. `value` must be encoded ([see RFC](https://www.rfc-editor.org/rfc/rfc3986#section-2.2) including `=`)

### Read-Only

- `all_roles` (Attributes List) All directly granted, inherited and group roles (read only) (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--all_roles))
- `created_on` (String) Creation date (read only)
- `default_role_id` (String) Default role id (read only)
- `directly_granted_roles` (Attributes List) Directly granted roles (read only) (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--directly_granted_roles))
- `email` (String) User email (read only)
- `scim_managed` (Boolean) SCIM managed (read only)

<a id="nestedatt--all_roles"></a>
### Nested Schema for `all_roles`

Read-Only:

- `admin_option` (Boolean) Admin option
- `principal` (Attributes) Principal (read only) (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--all_roles--principal))
- `role_id` (String) Role ID
- `role_name` (String) Role name

<a id="nestedatt--all_roles--principal"></a>
### Nested Schema for `all_roles.principal`

Read-Only:

- `id` (String) Principal ID
- `type` (String) Principal type



<a id="nestedatt--directly_granted_roles"></a>
### Nested Schema for `directly_granted_roles`

Read-Only:

- `admin_option` (Boolean) Admin option
- `principal` (Attributes) Principal (read only) (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--directly_granted_roles--principal))
- `role_id` (String) Role ID
- `role_name` (String) Role name

<a id="nestedatt--directly_granted_roles--principal"></a>
### Nested Schema for `directly_granted_roles.principal`

Read-Only:

- `id` (String) Principal ID
- `type` (String) Principal type
